mapper.select: SELECT P.post_no AS id, P.post_title AS title, U.user_id AS writer, P.post_write_datetime AS writeDate, COUNT(C.comment_no) AS commentCount FROM Posts AS P INNER JOIN Users AS U ON P.user_no = U.user_no INNER JOIN Comments AS C ON P.post_no = C.post_no GROUP BY P.post_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts(user_no, post_title, post_content, post_write_datetime, post_check_hide, post_hits) VALUES (#{num}, ${Post.title}, ${Post.content}, ${Post.writeDate}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update Posts set name='${name}' where id = #{id}
